entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
